description:
Bridge the gap between photogrammetry and CAD


Additional Updates and Improvements
- Coordinates in the status bar now display the elevation at the hovered location in both display and project CRS units
Bug fixes
- Fixed an issue where the column format in the import dialogs did not consistently update to reflect the selected columns
- Fixed an issue where the "Move to layer" options in the context menu and the main Edit menu displayed incorrect layer names and colors
- Fixed an issue where LandXML files failed to import if the file extension was capitalized (e.g., “.XML”)
- Fixed an issue to ensure that polylines generated with the offset tool are parallel to the original in all situations
